availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel M. Bowen (Franklin County, Kentucky, politician and farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, politician and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Holton Bowen. Father of John Bowen. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1847. Farmer in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 11A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 218.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 485B.
Journal of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky (1847), December 31, 1847, (Frankfort: A. G. Hodges, 1847), 4.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994034, Franklin County Births.
The Frankfort Roundabout (Frankfort, KY), May 31, 1884, p. 2.
